main event: Multiple witnesses reported seeing a bright orange circular object over Philadelphia, Pennsylvania on 9 April 1966.
interesting points: The object was described as larger than the sun and emitted no sound or exhaust., Witness Miss Regina McFadden reported observing the object hovering for about 5 minutes., Mrs. Robert Curran, who is familiar with aircraft, reported seeing a similar object with a red light in the center., The sightings were part of a series of reports investigated by Project Blue Book., The sightings occurred around the Philadelphia International Airport area.
witness description: Miss Regina McFadden and Mrs. Robert Curran reported their observations during the sightings.
